info.title: Laravel Survey API
info.description:
A comprehensive survey management API built with Laravel, featuring:
 * - Multi-role authentication (Admin, User, LINE OA)
 * - Real-time survey updates via WebSocket broadcasting
 * - Advanced analytics and reporting
 * - Export/Import functionality for surveys and responses
 * - Tiered rate limiting for security
 * - Email verification and password reset

post.description: Authenticate admin user and receive JWT token
Register new user account with email verification

get.description: Verify user email using verification token

post.description: Send password reset link to user email
Reset user password using reset token

get.description: Get list of active surveys available to public

post.description: Submit a response to a survey

404.description: Survey not found or not active

get.description: Retrieve specific survey response (only for the user who submitted it)
